name: @turanga/pipeline
description: With a Pipelines you can pass an object and perform any type of task and finally return the resulting value

scripts.eslint: npm run eslint:js && npm run eslint:md
scripts.eslint:md: eslint --fix --ext md README.md --rule strict:off --rule no-undef:off --rule no-unused-vars:off --rule func-names:off --rule no-console:off --rule consistent-return:off --rule import/no-unresolved:off --rule import/extensions:off --parser-options sourceType:module

author: js-turanga <js.turanga@gmail.com>
